Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/mail/biffs

What you'll find here: programs to raise an alert when you have new mail

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

biff+comsat-0.10.tar.gz (LSM entry) (signature) 1997-06-12
mail-notification daemon and enable/disable cmd (formerly part of netkit) (10000 bytes)
coolmail-1.3+maildir.patch.gz (LSM entry) (LSM entry) 1998-02-18
enhancement patch for coolmail (3239 bytes)
coolmail-1.3.tgz (LSM entry) (LSM entry) 1996-01-15
biff replacement with 3d animation (26809 bytes)
kbiff-1.0.2.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-10-14
"xbiff"-like mail notification utility (240066 bytes)
korn-0.3.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-10-14
multiple-mailbox mail notification program using KDE (74707 bytes)
mailleds-0.93.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1996-05-21
blink your keyboard LEDs when there is new mail (23899 bytes)
newmail3.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1994-10-03
incoming mail notifier which can use Sox `play' command (5126 bytes)
xiobiff.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1995-01-31
X biff program for systems with SLIP/PPP connection, displays outgoing queue status (7486 bytes)
xlassie-1.3.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-01-02
enhanced biff with POP3 capabilities, message-count reporting, smaller footprint (15857 bytes)
xmailbox-2.5-bin.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-07-16
X new-mail notifier that can use sounds and animation [bin] (40929 bytes)
xmailbox-2.5-src.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-07-16
X new-mail notifier that can use sounds and animation [src] (43535 bytes)
xmailtool-4-linux.tgz (LSM entry?) 1994-02-28
mail program under X (standard widgets) (28300 bytes)
